name: Jumpsmith
description:
TRAILER IS HERE: http://www.jumpsmithgame.com

Jumpsmith is a 2d platforming universe of chain reactions and strange challenges that can be explored solo or in a bitter co-op. Play through the massive 342 room open world to unlock features in the powerful-yet-simple level editor, which can be easily used with a controller or keyboard. Swap between testing and creating with a single button.

Check out Jumpsmith on Greenlight:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=398428082
